menu_text: Welcome to the bot menu ğŸ‘‹
instruction_text: Full instructions where to download, install and use SCAM mode INSTALLATION: 1. Download SCAM mode (attached below is a file with the current version of SCAM mode). 2. We unpack where it is convenient for you. 3. Find the folder with the game and throw the file Assembly-CSharp.dll at CWClient\CWclient_Data\Managed with replacement (before that you need to close the game). USAGE: after you have successfully logged into the game, go to the console (the ~ key) and enter scam (activates SCAM mode). All camouflage for any weapon and body kits are activated immediately, you don't even have to write scam. Now let's go through the commands: scam - enabling SCAM Mode scam_off - disabling SCAM Mode scam_hc - transferring the arcade mode interface to hardcore + skills, heat, etc.. proscam - activates the commands scam_hc, devmode, freegun, full_thermal freegun - free choice of weapons during combat devmode - activates aim (hold down the N key) and vx addnickchanges 10 - adds 10 (you can enter any number) nickname shifts wtask ID - purchase of wtasks (you need to specify the weapon ID and also wind up GP) GP 1000 - GP cheat (visual) SP 100 - cheat SP (visual) CR 100000 - CR cheat (visual) level 71 - makes you 71 lvl (visual) repa 500 - set 500 reputation (visual) exp 500 - put 500 experience (visual) wipewtask - remove all wtask (visual) masterofarms - put all wtask (visual) knifedelay - quick knife buyanov - buyanov's eye - 100% accuracy (visual) hidden_server_access - displaying hidden players and so on..addsnow - adds snow to the map full_thermal - thermal imager for the entire map (or the b key in proscam/devmode) show_enemy_nick - displaying nicknames when lighting or hitting players connect_over_limit - the ability to enter maps when fully filled clear - clears the console showcross - crosshair s_debug - list of servers targetframerate 144 - FPS limit to the number you need list - shows the list of players on the server online - shows the number of players in the game socialID - your ID in the social network userID - your ID in the game weapinfo - information about weapons (only on the server) promo (XXXXX-XXXXX-XXXXX-XXXXX-XXXXX) - activation of promo code clearprofile - reset profile (NOT visual) Fixed delta time -1 - fixed interval http_debug - laying http requests The commands are written in the settings in the SCAM info tab
